column5: I see Naughty Pines is back in operation under new ownership and with a new name - English River Outfitters (I think). Has anybody been there? I am curious what it is like. Dan
I will be at Anderson's Manitou Falls which is the only other camp on that system on hte 14th of Aug. I will check it out. I see they have a website up a running. Not much for pictures though.
